prerequisite: A pass in GCE "O"Level Chinese Language "B"syllabus or higher, or equivalent.
moduleDescription: This is a bilingual introductory course on some of the most interesting topics in Chinese history, literature, and culture. Through the study of a variety of genres, such as films, poetry, and short stories, the course aims to subvert one's contemporary impression of a conservative China and Chinese way of life,both past and present. Classes will be delivered in either Chinese or English, depending on the topics. Readings and presentation slides will be mainly in English. Students can choose to do the term essay in either language.
